name: Goblin
description: Goblins are small, cunning creatures known for their quick wits and faster feet. They are often found in large numbers, causing trouble and mayhem wherever they go. Goblins are resourceful, able to survive in the harshest environments, and they have a knack for finding (or stealing) what they need to survive.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.
special: Nimble Escape: You can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of your turns.
